name: City Crusher - Arcade Edition for VIC-20 3K Exp.
name_original: City Crusher - Arcade Edition for VIC-20 3K Exp.
description:
A Coin-op "like" version of an old Vic-20 Game called City Crusher. 

VIC-20 + 3Kb RAM, or VICE or THEC64 required.

Keys:

F1 - Press and hold F1 button to start, when "insert coin(s)" appear on the screen. 

Left arrow - Pause. 

Any key - Drop bombs.
